General.Name: K Seng Seng Corporation Bhd
General.Description: K. Seng Seng Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacturing and processing of secondary stainless steel and other metal related products in Malaysia. It operates through Stainless Steel and Metal Related Products; Marine Hardware and Consumable; Other Industrial Hardware; and Engineering Works segments. The company manufactures stainless steel tubes and ornamental pipes, as well as processes stainless steel sheets products. It also trades in stainless steel flat and long products, as well as other metal related products; marine hardware and consumables; and other industrial hardware products. In addition, the company fabricates and installs chlorination nitrile and rubber glove dipping lines; trades in dipping line parts and consumable; and offers engineering services, including machining, cutting, dismantling, and cleaning of conveyor chains. Further, it manufactures stainless steel conveyor chains, rigging accessories, and components. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Balakong, Malaysia.
